params.label: Patient Name
params.description: The name of the patient in the medical database. This will be filled in after init.

params.label: Dye Timing Matched
params.description: If match between the current time and the expected pre-op injection of dye in their medical record.

params.label: Dye Matched Time
params.default: The time when timing was last set.

params.label: Injection Time
params.default: The time found in the patient's database.
